tool_description: Creates comprehensive competitor profiles by aggregating all analysis results into structured summaries with strengths, weaknesses, and positioning insights.

competitor_name.description: Name of the competitor to profile

rating_data_source.description: Source identifier for competitor rating data

sentiment_data_source.description: Source identifier for competitor sentiment data

keyword_data_source.description: Source identifier for competitor keyword data

classification_data_source.description: Source identifier for classified review data

trend_data_source.description: Source identifier for trend analysis data

include_swot_analysis.description: Whether to generate SWOT analysis based on review insights

error_messages: Competitor not found: The specified competitor_name was not found in the provided data sources.
Invalid data sources: One or more required data source identifiers are invalid or inaccessible.
Insufficient data for profiling: Not enough analysis data available to generate comprehensive profile.
Data source mismatch: Data sources contain conflicting or incompatible competitor information.
Profile generation failed: Unable to synthesize provided data into coherent competitor profile.
usage: Provide competitor name and required data sources from previous analysis tools. Optionally include classification and trend data for deeper insights. Returns comprehensive competitor profile.

review_volume.description: Total number of reviews analyzed for this competitor

key_strengths.description: Identified strengths based on positive review themes

key_weaknesses.description: Identified weaknesses based on negative review themes

competitive_position.description: Summary of competitor's market position and differentiation

profile_summary.description: Comprehensive competitor profile summary with key insights
